title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Employment Affairs and Social Protection) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister employment affair social protection) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Pauric McPhillips, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Employment Affairs and Social Protection, Áras 
Mhic Dhiarmada, Store Street, Dublin 1, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Employment Affairs and Social Protection with effect from 27 
June 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [402] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
